lines.text: HEY! I've been holding up this here bridge for over an hour so it wouldn't fall on you.
It's gonna be all right. We've just been waiting so long and trying so hard. Oh, it's all right Billy Joe.
It ain't all right! I ain't all right!
[long pause as Billy Joe walks a few steps away from Bobbie Lee]

Bobbie... I have been with a man! Did you hear me? Which is a sin against nature! A sin against God! I don't know how I could have done it, I swear! I don't know how I could be wanting you and do that.
But you were drunk. Maybe you just imagined it.
But you were drunk. Everyone saw how drunk you were.
I... I knew. I knew what was happening.
Why? I wish I could understand.
